refnamediv.refpurpose: Select sample value based on audio-rate comparisons.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Select sample value from three based on audio-rate comparisons of two signals.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: aout select a1, a2, aless, aequal, amore

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: a1, a2 -- audio signals that are compared.
aless -- audio signal selected if a1[n]<a2[n]
aequal -- audio signal selected if a1[n]=a2[n]
asig -- audio signal selected if a1[n]>a2[n]
The comparison is made sample by sample.
